# PoliCICS Website (Public Build)

⚠️ **DO NOT EDIT THIS REPOSITORY MANUALLY** ⚠️

This repository contains the compiled static files (HTML, CSS, JS) for the [PoliCICS website](https://policics.github.io). It is automatically generated and deployed via GitHub Actions.

### How to make changes?

Any changes made directly to this repository **will be overwritten** by the next automated deployment. For PoliCICS Members, please edit the source code in the private `policics-web-source` repository.

---
*Generated by Hugo & GitHub Actions*
